term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - spectrochemical carrier in atomic spectroscopy
term.title: spectrochemical carrier

item.text: An additive which gives rise to a gas which can help to transport the vapour of the sample material into the excitation region of the source, e.g. carbon in an air atmosphere when carbon dioxide is formed.
